name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 5 - Air Raider Piloted Weapon Combat Frame Gold Nyx
detailed_description:
A golden-coated version of the very sparsely produced combat frame Nyx. Though the intention of the gold paint is to reflect radar waves, it has not been proven to have any effect. The flashy appearance, however, has won it command and ceremonial positions.
This ridable, powered exoskeleton covers the soldier's entire body, protecting them from bombs and other dangers while providing the full range of human movement. It houses thrusts on its back, allowing the user to fly for a short period of time by pressing and holding the jump button."
